response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe in valuing our customers' needs and desires, and we're confident that this product will exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we are offering it to you at a special price of $900,000. This is a significant discount from its market value of $1,000,000, reflecting our commitment to making high-quality products accessible to discerning individuals like yourself. We trust that you will find this offer irresistible and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.", "product_price": 900000}
